ada.ws.html:
<script>
// whistle
if (!window.WebSocket) {
  console.log('您的浏览器不支持WebSocket，页面自动刷新功能不可用，请更换浏览器！')
} else {
  try {
    var retries = 0
    var ws = null
    var host = location.host+':8000'
    var pathname = location.pathname

    function initSocket () {
      ws = new WebSocket('ws://127.0.0.1:8200/pages?host=' + host + '&pathname=' + pathname)
      ws.onopen = function(evt) {
        retries = 0
        console.log('已和socket服务器建立连接')
      }

      ws.onmessage = function(evt) {
        console.log('接收到socket服务器指令：' + evt.data)
        var commands = JSON.parse(evt.data)
        if (commands.eventName === 'REFRESH') {
          location.reload()
        }
      }

      ws.onclose = function(evt) {
        ws = null
        console.log('与socket服务器断开连接')
        console.log('尝试重新连接socket服务器')

        if (retries <= 10) {
          var retryInMs = 1000 * Math.pow(2, retries) + Math.random() * 100
          retries += 1

          setTimeout(initSocket, retryInMs)
        }
      }
    }

    initSocket()
  } catch (err) {
    console.log('连接socket异常，请检查服务是否成功启动！')
  }
}
</script>
